column3: Great for a quick cup of coffee.  Clean and comfortable and outdoor seating.
Coffee is ok, I don't recommend the pain au chocolat
this is not really a coffee shop. it's just a small area with a few snacks and some pre-brewed coffee pots mainly for Hyatt guests. don't go there!
The Vietnamese  Iced Coffee is to die for. Much Recommended
10.85 for a cold brew is unforgivable
